envelopes.name: Diagnostic Recommendations
assumptions: AI provides differential diagnosis suggestions only, never final diagnoses.
All recommendations include confidence levels and evidence sources.
Patient safety is paramount — false negatives are weighted heavily.
constraints: Never present recommendations as conclusive diagnoses
Require human physician review for all critical findings

envelopes.name: Medication Interaction Alerts
assumptions: Drug interaction database is continuously updated.
Patient allergy history is complete and accurate.
constraints: Require pharmacist override for moderate interactions
Log all interaction checks for audit

envelopes.name: Patient Triage Priority
assumptions: Triage decisions are advisory — clinical staff have final authority.
Vital signs are continuously monitored and accurate.
Wait time optimization does not override clinical urgency.
constraints: Maintain audit trail of all triage recommendations

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Diagnostic recommendation envelope activated for clinical support.

events.label: Differential diagnosis generated
events.detail: DiagnosticAssist suggests pneumonia (82% confidence) based on imaging and symptoms. Flagged for physician review.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Medication interaction checking envelope activated for pharmacy operations.

events.label: Drug interaction detected
events.detail: InteractionChecker identified moderate interaction between warfarin and aspirin. Escalated to pharmacist for review.

events.label: Pharmacist override approved
events.detail: Pharmacist reviewed interaction, confirmed patient monitoring plan. Decision: Dispense with warning label.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Emergency triage advisory envelope activated. Revision REV-MED-003-A includes updated vital sign thresholds.

events.label: Vital signs deteriorating
events.detail: VitalTrendMonitor detected BP drop and O2 saturation decline in patient #4472. Priority escalation recommended.

events.label: Confidence threshold adjusted
events.detail: Medical Steward updated minimum confidence from 75% to 80% after DSG review of false positive rates.
events.reason: Reduce false positive escalations while maintaining patient safety margins.

events.label: DSG: Diagnostic accuracy review
events.detail: Stewardship group convened to review diagnostic recommendation performance over past week.

events.label: High-severity interaction blocked
events.detail: AllergyGuard blocked prescription: Patient documented allergy to penicillin class. Alternative required.

events.label: Triage accuracy stable
events.detail: ER triage recommendations aligned with clinical decisions in 94% of cases. No boundary adjustments needed.

events.label: Diagnosis pattern embedded
events.detail: Differential diagnosis recommendation stored for similar symptom clusters.
events.semanticContext: differential diagnosis for chest pain with EKG abnormalities

events.label: Drug interaction embedded
events.detail: Medication interaction pattern stored for future safety checks.
events.semanticContext: warfarin and aspirin contraindication for bleeding risk patients

events.label: Triage decision embedded
events.detail: Emergency triage pattern stored for trauma priority assessment.
